title: WTF IS A LEGACY SKIN?!!!!1
body: can anyone tell me wtf a legacy skin is?

replies.body: A legacy skin is a skin that is not always available in stores, but can make a come back at any point.  Our[ legacy skins guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)has more info as well!
